planets.name: Tatooine

layouts.name: Anchorhead Spaceport
layouts.description: A busy spaceport with traders and travelers

planets.main_quest: Investigate mysterious signals coming from Tatooine
side_quests: Help local merchants deal with smuggler problems
Rescue missing persons from dangerous areas
planets.lore_description: Tatooine is a desert world with a harsh climate, home to a small population governed by corporate interests. The planet's unique characteristics have shaped both its inhabitants and their culture over millennia.

planets.name: Coruscant

layouts.name: Senate District
layouts.description: The political heart of the Republic

layouts.name: Jedi Temple
layouts.description: Sacred halls of the Jedi Order

planets.main_quest: Uncover ancient secrets hidden beneath Coruscant
side_quests: Mediate a dispute between rival factions
planets.lore_description: Coruscant is an urban world with a controlled climate, home to a massive population governed by a republic democracy. The planet's unique characteristics have shaped both its inhabitants and their culture over millennia.

planets.name: Korriban

layouts.name: Sith Academy
layouts.description: Ancient academy of the dark side

planets.main_quest: Confront the dark presence corrupting Korriban
side_quests: Explore abandoned facilities for valuable technology
Uncover corruption in the local government
planets.lore_description: Korriban is a volcanic world with a hot climate, home to a sparse population governed by the sith empire. The planet's unique characteristics have shaped both its inhabitants and their culture over millennia.

final_boss.name: Darth Malice
final_boss.title: Dark Lord
final_boss.motivation: seeks ultimate power through ancient Sith artifacts
final_boss.backstory: Darth Malice, known as Dark Lord, is a Human who seeks ultimate power through ancient Sith artifacts. Born during the old republic era, Darth Malice was once a promising individual who showed great potential in the Force. However, their path took a dark turn when they discovered ancient secrets that changed their perspective on the galaxy.
mechanics: Boss gains new abilities and changes tactics at 75%, 50%, and 25% health
Arena features dangerous environmental elements that activate periodically
Boss summons waves of minions throughout the fight

phases.name: Opening Assault
phases.tactics: Aggressive attacks to test the player's strength

phases.name: Escalation
phases.tactics: Introduces environmental hazards and summons minions

phases.name: Desperation
phases.tactics: Uses most powerful abilities and becomes more unpredictable

phases.name: Final Stand
phases.tactics: Unleashes full power in a last desperate attempt

final_boss.arena_description: A dark temple filled with Sith artifacts and dangerous energy. Located on Korriban, this sith_temple reflects the planet's volcanic environment. Dark energy pulses through the walls, and ancient Sith statues watch the battle.

loot_drop.name: Darth Malice's Legacy
loot_drop.flavor_text: The final remnant of Dark Lord Darth Malice's power. This legendary weapon pulses with the Force energy of its former owner, granting incredible abilities to those worthy enough to wield it.

weaknesses: Can be turned against the boss

main_quest_outline:
MAIN QUEST: Test Campaign For Unreal Engine Integration

ACT I - The Call to Adventure
- Begin on Tatooine: Discover the threat to the galaxy
- Learn of Darth Malice's dark plans
- Gather allies and begin your heroic journey

ACT II - The Hero's Journey
- Travel to 1 worlds to stop the darkness
- Save civilizations and gain powerful allies
- Uncover Darth Malice's weakness

ACT III - The Light Triumphant
- Confront Darth Malice on Korriban
- Rally your allies for the final battle in A dark temple filled with Sith artifacts and dangerous energy. Located on Korriban, this sith_temple reflects the planet's volcanic environment. Dark energy pulses through the walls, and ancient Sith statues watch the battle.
- Restore peace and balance to the galaxy
campaign_summary:
Campaign: Test Campaign For Unreal Engine Integration
Duration: 15 hours
Era: Old Republic
Alignment: Light Side focus

Your journey will take you across 3 worlds including Tatooine, Coruscant, Korriban.
The ultimate confrontation awaits with Darth Malice, seeks ultimate power through ancient Sith artifacts.

This campaign emphasizes light side choices and is set during the old republic era.
